posts.post_content:
I am selling a large number of t205s (90 now, more later).  Included are, commons, stars, HOFers, variations, Short Prints.

There are a few graded ones which are duplicates from my personal collection.    Each card is priced individually and reasonably.  I will not charge a lot for shipping.  $3 flat fee.  Add 3% for paypal.  


[URL="http://imageevent.com/ltsgallery/memberfoldersko/mrc32/forsale"]Here is the link to the imageevent gallery[/URL]

Email me at mrc32 @ insightbb.com.  I will take the first request for the card.

This sale is perfect for t205 collectors, team collectors, etc.



EDITED TO ADD:
I am now asking $2050 for the lot.

I have added 10 new commons, all higher grade (scroll down to the bottom).

I will also add in 11 lower grade t205 (one of which is Hugh Jennings).

This is a nice lot with 7 HOFers, SPs and Variations.

LMK

Email sent on two cards.

r/
